message: Let's make a deal Bob! I take $60, you get $40, and we both walk away happy.
I think we can do better, Alice! How about I take $55 and you get $45?
Okay Bob, let's be fair. I'll take $55, you take $45. It's still more than you offered last round!
I think I can do a bit better than your last offer, Alice. How about I take $58 and you get $42?
Bob, we're running out of time! This deal is getting worse for both of us with every round. I'll take $52, you take $48, and we're done.
